name: Bacon Ranch Nugget Sliders
author: Melissa Kip
summary: Family-friendly, so easy and just plain yummy! Mini chicken sandwiches are a quick fix when you have a pile of kids on your hands. Excellent for kids, parties, and life on a budget. These little sandwiches are easily tweaked to taste. I look forward to hearing others' suggestions!
ingredients: 1 (4.3 ounce) package real crumbled bacon bits
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Spread chicken nuggets and slider buns on separate baking sheets
Bake chicken nuggets in the preheated oven until heated through and crisp, 15 to 20 minutes
Bake slider buns until lightly toasted, 3 to 5 minutes
Place 2 chicken nuggets on each toasted bun
Place a leaf of lettuce and slice of tomato on top
